DataSource.Sql: SELECT PatientID AS EDWPatientID , CASE GenderCD WHEN 'Female' THEN 'female' WHEN 'Male' THEN 'male' ELSE 'unknown' END AS gender ,BirthDTS as birthDate FROM [Person].[SourcePatientBASE]

SELECT PatientID AS EDWPatientID, CONCAT(PatientID,'-','MR') as KeyLevel1, 'usual' as [use], 'http://www.healthcatalyst.com' as system, MRN as value, 'MR' as type FROM [Person].[SourcePatientBASE] UNION SELECT PatientID AS EDWPatientID, CONCAT(PatientID,'-','SB') as KeyLevel1, 'usual' as [use], 'http://www.healthcatalyst.com' as system, SSN as value, 'SB' as type FROM [Person].[SourcePatientBASE] UNION SELECT PatientID AS EDWPatientID, CONCAT(PatientID,'-','PI') as KeyLevel1, 'usual' as [use], 'http://www.healthcatalyst.com' as system, PatientID as value, 'PI' as type FROM [Person].[SourcePatientBASE]
SELECT PatientID AS EDWPatientID, PatientID as KeyLevel1, PatientLastNM as family, PatientFirstNM as given, PatientFullNM as text FROM [Person].[SourcePatientBASE]
SELECT PatientID AS EDWPatientID, PatientID as KeyLevel1, LanguageDSC as language FROM [Person].[SourcePatientBASE]
SELECT PatientID AS EDWPatientID, PatientID as KeyLevel1, 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-race' as url FROM [Person].[SourcePatientBASE]

SELECT PatientID AS EDWPatientID, PatientID as KeyLevel1, PatientID as KeyLevel2, 'ombCategory' as url , CASE RaceDSC WHEN 'Declined' THEN '' WHEN 'American Indian or Alaskan Native' THEN '1002-5' WHEN 'Other' THEN '' WHEN 'Black or African American' THEN '2054-5' WHEN 'Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander' THEN '2076-8' WHEN 'White or Caucasian' THEN '2106-3' WHEN 'Two Races' THEN '' WHEN 'Asian' THEN '2028-9' ELSE '' END AS valueCoding FROM [Person].[SourcePatientBASE]

SELECT PatientID AS EDWPatientID , CONCAT(DiagnosisID,'-',RowSourceDSC,'-',DiagnosisTypeDSC) as KeyLevel1 , 'active' as clinicalStatus , 'confirmed' as verificationStatus FROM [Clinical].[DiagnosisBASE]

SELECT PatientID AS EDWPatientID , CONCAT(DiagnosisID,'-',RowSourceDSC,'-',DiagnosisTypeDSC) as KeyLevel1 , CONCAT(DiagnosisID,'-',RowSourceDSC,'-',DiagnosisTypeDSC) as KeyLevel2 , CASE DiagnosisTypeDSC WHEN 'ICD Problem List Code' THEN 'problem-list-item' WHEN 'ICD Primary Diagnosis Code' THEN 'problem' WHEN 'ICD Diagnosis Cod' THEN 'problem' WHEN 'ICD Admit Diagnosis Code' THEN 'encounter-diagnosis' ELSE 'health-concern' END AS coding , DiagnosisTypeDSC as text FROM [Clinical].[DiagnosisBASE]

SELECT PatientID AS EDWPatientID , CONCAT(DiagnosisID,'-',RowSourceDSC,'-',DiagnosisTypeDSC) as KeyLevel1 , CONCAT(DiagnosisID,'-',RowSourceDSC,'-',DiagnosisTypeDSC) as KeyLevel2 , CASE CodeTypeCD WHEN 'ICD9DX' THEN 'http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-9-cm' WHEN 'ICD10DX' THEN 'http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm' ELSE NULL END AS system , DiagnosisCD as code , DiagnosisDSC as text FROM [Clinical].[DiagnosisBASE]
